definition: A cherished narrative often shared with children, typically involving magical or fantastical elements, and serving as a source of entertainment and moral lessons.

examples.english: My favorite fairy tale is Snow White.
What is your favorite fairy tale?

examples.german: Ich habe viele Lieblingsmärchen, aber Rotkäppchen ist eines meiner Favoriten.
examples.english: I have many favorite fairy tales, but Little Red Riding Hood is one of my favorites.

examples.german: Lieblingsmärchen sind oft Geschichten, die uns in unserer Kindheit begleitet haben.
examples.english: Favorite fairy tales are often stories that accompanied us in our childhood.

examples.german: Ich erzähle meinen Kindern gerne meine Lieblingsmärchen von früher.
examples.english: I enjoy telling my children my favorite fairy tales from the past.
